attributes.action: direct flights to northern cyprus and pressure to end the embargo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We travel regularly to North Cyprus and as you are aware there are no direct flights allowed to Ercan Airport.  As a grren environmental tax has now been created, it seems hypocritical that an aircraft has to land in Turkey, only to take off again to land 45 minutes later in North Cyprus.  This action goes against everything that the green campaign stands for.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "direct flights to northern cyprus and pressure to end the embargo."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14608.asp

Prime Minister's Office
